person.persName: Madison "Matty" Conyers Johnson (Son of George Washington Johnson and Ann Eliza Viley)

body.p: Residence: Georgetown, Scott County, Kentucky. No occupation yet in the 1860 census (age 18). Born in Scott County, Kentucky, son of George Washington Johnson and Ann Eliza Viley. Married Adele Greaves Stokes in 1865.
